ClaimType.UserHelpText: Specifies whether your account is Local or not.

ClaimType.DisplayName: Is the User Account Not Local Or Enabled

ClaimType.UserHelpText: Enter new password

Pattern.HelpText: 8-16 characters, containing 3 out of 4 of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), and one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .
